mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_tbl ( title , content , viewQty , likeQty , createId , createDt , deleteFlag) VALUES ( #{title} , #{content} , 0 , 0 , #{createId} , #{createDt} , false)
mapper.select: SELECT bt.id , bt.title , bt.content , bt.viewQty , bt.likeQty , bt.createId , bt.createDt , ct.nickname As createName , bt.updateId , bt.updateDt , ut.nickname As updateName , bt.deleteId , bt.deleteDt , dt.nickname As deleteName , bt.deleteFlag FROM board_tbl AS bt LEFT OUTER JOIN user_tbl AS ct on bt.createId = ct.id LEFT OUTER JOIN user_tbl AS ut on bt.updateId = ut.id LEFT OUTER JOIN user_tbl AS dt on bt.deleteId = dt.id WHERE bt.id = #{id} AND bt.deleteFlag = false

SELECT bt.id , bt.title , (SELECT count(*) from board_comment_tbl WHERE boardId = bt.id AND deleteFlag=false) AS totalComment , bt.content , bt.viewQty , bt.likeQty , bt.createId , bt.createDt , ct.nickname As createName , bt.updateId , bt.updateDt , ut.nickname As updateName , bt.deleteId , bt.deleteDt , dt.nickname As deleteName , bt.deleteFlag FROM board_tbl AS bt LEFT OUTER JOIN user_tbl AS ct on bt.createId = ct.id LEFT OUTER JOIN user_tbl AS ut on bt.updateId = ut.id LEFT OUTER JOIN user_tbl AS dt on bt.deleteId = dt.id WHERE bt.title like CONCAT('%',#{searchTitle},'%') AND bt.deleteFlag = false ORDER BY ${orderByWord} LIMIT #{rowsOnePage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_tbl AS bt WHERE title like CONCAT('%',#{searchTitle},'%') AND deleteFlag = false
mapper.update: UPDATE board_tbl SET viewQty = viewQty + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND deleteFlag = false
UPDATE board_tbl SET likeQty = likeQty + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND deleteFlag = false
UPDATE board_tbl SET likeQty = likeQty - 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND deleteFlag = false
